game.name: Eclipsed Remnant
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In a world where every soul is captured, yours remain free. Take the chance and claim their souls for yourself and rise unstoppable...
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a world where every soul is captured, yours remain free. Take the chance and claim their souls for yourself and rise unstoppable...
